testimonials_subtitle: What our customers say about us
home_intro: We export premium spices, essential oils, and dried herbs with fast, reliable worldwide shipping. Contact us to learn more about our full product range.
our_products_desc: Here are some of the products that we deal with.
spices_intro: We supply several varieties of spices, including but not limited to Turmeric, Black Turmeric, Black Ginger, Chilli, Nutmeg, Coriander, Cardamom, Clove, Cinnamon, Jeera, Ajowan, Fenugreek, Ginger, and Black Pepper.
spices_desc: Spices are plant-based ingredients adding flavor, aroma, and color to food. Used worldwide in cooking, teas, and wellness.
oils_intro: We supply pure and natural essential oils that are widely used in aromatherapy, cosmetics, wellness, and natural formulations.
oils_desc: Essential oils are concentrated plant extracts known for their aromatic properties, widely used in aromatherapy, cosmetics, and wellness.
herbs_intro: We supply carefully dried herbs that retain natural aroma, flavor, and nutrients for culinary and wellness uses.
herbs_desc: Dried herbs retain natural flavor and aroma, making them essential for seasoning, teas, and traditional practices worldwide.
turmeric_desc: Turmeric (Curcuma longa) rhizome is prized for its earthy flavor, golden-yellow color, and traditional culinary and wellness uses.
black_turmeric_desc: Black Turmeric (Curcuma caesia Roxb.) rhizome is a rare, critically endangered herb valued for medicinal and culinary applications.
ginger_desc: Ginger (Zingiber officinale) rhizome is valued worldwide for its pungent flavor, aroma, and traditional health applications.
nutmeg_desc: Nutmeg (Myristica fragrans) seed is prized as a warm, aromatic spice used in sweet and savory dishes, beverages, and traditional remedies.
coriander_desc: Coriander (Coriandrum sativum) seeds are aromatic spices with citrus notes, widely used in global cuisines and traditional remedies.
cardamom_desc: Cardamom (Elettaria cardamomum) pods are aromatic spices valued for flavoring foods, beverages, and herbal formulations.
clove_desc: Clove (Syzygium aromaticum) dried flower buds are aromatic and used as spices in cooking, teas, and wellness traditions.
cinnamon_desc: Cinnamon (Cinnamomum verum) bark is a sweet, aromatic spice used worldwide in culinary, beverages, and wellness practices.
jeera_desc: Jeera (Cuminum cyminum) seeds are aromatic spices used for their warm, earthy flavor in global cuisines.
ajowan_desc: Ajowan (Trachyspermum ammi) seeds are aromatic spices with strong flavor, used in traditional cooking and remedies.
fenugreek_desc: Fenugreek (Trigonella foenum-graecum) seeds are valued for culinary uses and traditional health applications.
black_ginger_desc: Black Ginger (Kaempferia parviflora) rhizome is native to Thailand, traditionally used for vitality, stamina, and wellness.
chilli_desc: Chilli (Capsicum spp.) fruit is valued for its fiery heat, vibrant color, and essential role in global culinary traditions.
black_pepper_desc: Black Pepper (Piper nigrum) fruit is known as the king of spices, widely used for flavoring, seasoning, and wellness.
lavender_oil_desc: Lavender oil (Lavandula angustifolia) distilled from flowers is known for its calming aroma and widely used in relaxation, skincare, and wellness.
peppermint_oil_desc: Peppermint oil (Mentha Ã— piperita) extracted from leaves provides a refreshing cooling effect and is valued in aromatherapy, oral care, and culinary use.
eucalyptus_oil_desc: Eucalyptus oil (Eucalyptus globulus) distilled from leaves is known for its invigorating scent and traditional use in respiratory wellness.
turmeric_oil_desc: Turmeric oil (Curcuma longa) extracted from rhizomes is valued for its earthy aroma and wellness applications.
acorus_calamus_oil_desc: Acorus calamus oil is obtained from rhizomes and traditionally used in herbal formulations and aromatherapy.
citroneela_oil_desc: Citronella oil (Cymbopogon nardus) distilled from leaves is widely used as a natural insect repellent and in aromatherapy.
cardamom_oil_desc: Cardamom oil (Elettaria cardamomum) distilled from seeds is valued for flavoring and wellness applications.
palmarosa_oil_desc: Palmarosa oil (Cymbopogon martinii) extracted from grass is prized for its floral fragrance and therapeutic uses.
black_pepper_oil_desc: Black pepper oil (Piper nigrum) steam-distilled from fruits is used in culinary, wellness, and aromatherapy applications.
nutmeg_oil_desc: Nutmeg oil (Myristica fragrans) obtained from seeds is valued for culinary, aromatic, and medicinal uses.
vetiver_oil_desc: Vetiver oil (Chrysopogon zizanioides) distilled from roots is prized for its deep, earthy scent in perfumery and wellness.
lemongrass_oil_desc: Lemongrass oil (Cymbopogon citratus) distilled from leaves is valued for its fresh, citrus aroma and therapeutic benefits.
ginger_oil_desc: Ginger oil (Zingiber officinale) extracted from rhizomes is widely used in aromatherapy, massage, and wellness.
neem_oil_desc: Neem oil (Azadirachta indica) extracted from seeds is traditionally used in skincare, haircare, agriculture, and wellness applications.
basil_desc: Basil (Ocimum basilicum) dried leaves add sweet, aromatic notes to sauces, soups, and herbal teas.
oregano_desc: Oregano (Origanum vulgare) dried leaves are aromatic and used widely in Mediterranean and global cuisines.
mint_desc: Mint (Mentha spp.) dried leaves are refreshing and aromatic, used in teas, beverages, and traditional preparations.
vasambu_desc: Vasambu (Acorus calamus) rhizome is used in traditional wellness and herbal applications.
long_pepper_desc: Long Pepper (Piper longum) fruit and root are used as pungent spices in traditional medicine and cuisine.
myro_balan_desc: Myro Balan (Terminalia chebula) fruit is valued in Ayurveda for digestive and cleansing properties.
ashwagandha_desc: Ashwagandha (Withania somnifera) root is a renowned adaptogen used in traditional wellness practices.
avaranboo_desc: Avaranboo (Senna auriculata) dried leaves and flowers are used in traditional health remedies.
kuppaimeenai_desc: Kuppaimeenai (Acalypha indica) leaves and roots are valued in traditional herbal practices.
keelaneli_desc: Keelaneli (Phyllanthus amarus) leaves and roots are used in traditional medicine.
neerunchi_desc: Neerunchi (Tribulus terrestris) fruit is used in traditional remedies for vitality and wellness.
neem_desc: Neem (Azadirachta indica) leaves, seeds, and oil are valued for wellness, skincare, and medicinal uses.
nithiyakalayani_desc: Nithiyakalayani (Catharanthus roseus) dried leaves and flowers are used in traditional medicine.
adadhoda_desc: Adadhoda (Justicia adhatoda) leaves are valued for respiratory wellness and traditional applications.
kumudikai_desc: Kumudikai (Citrullus colocynthis) fruit is used in traditional herbal remedies.
nanari_desc: Nanari (Hemidesmus indicus) root is aromatic and used in traditional beverages and wellness.
sundaikai_desc: Sundaikai (Solanum torvum) dried fruits are used in curries and traditional remedies.
kandankathitri_desc: Kandankathitri (Solanum virginianum) roots and seeds are used in traditional medicine.
oomathai_desc: Oomathai (Datura stramonium) seeds are traditionally used with caution in herbal remedies.
soapnut_desc: Soapnut (Sapindus spp.) fruit is used as a natural cleanser and in traditional practices.
avuri_desc: Avuri (Indigofera tinctoria) leaves are traditionally used for natural dyes and herbal applications.
naiyuruvi_desc: Naiyuruvi (Achyranthes aspera) leaves and roots are used in traditional remedies.
nochi_desc: Nochi (Vitex negundo) leaves are used for their traditional wellness benefits.
thuthi_desc: Thuthi (Abutilon indicum) leaves are used in traditional medicine for wellness support.
thulasi_desc: Thulasi (Ocimum sanctum) leaves are highly regarded in Ayurveda for their wellness benefits.
alari_desc: Alari (Abutilon indicum) leaves and seeds are used in traditional applications.
alari_yellow_desc: Alari Yellow (Abutilon indicum) leaves and seeds are used in traditional remedies.
eruku_desc: Eruku (Calotropis gigantea) dried leaves and flowers are used in traditional herbal practices.
castor_desc: Castor (Ricinus communis) roots and seeds are valued for castor oil production and traditional uses.
banyan_tree_desc: Banyan Tree (Ficus benghalensis) dried leaves and fruits are used in traditional remedies.
sacred_fig_desc: Sacred Fig (Ficus religiosa) dried leaves and fruits are traditionally revered and used in herbal practices.
